Paragraph: The aim of this study is to assess the prevalence of early postoperative delirium in a population without known risk factors admitted to the ICU for postoperative monitoring after elective major surgery .

| Surgery (elective major) |

The paragraph is about a study assessing the prevalence of a specific condition called "early postoperative delirium" in a population undergoing "elective major surgery" who do not have known risk factors and are admitted to the ICU for postoperative monitoring.
